condition.ab: Light brown papyrus. The original cutting lines have been preserved on all four sides. Written with a thin pen, in black ink perpendicular to the fibers on Recto, parallel to the fibers on Verso. Some small holes and one larger piece are broken off on the right side causing slight damage to the text.
